name: Inflation Stress Reduction
description:
A stress reduction clicker designed to ease the pain of rising inflation. Guaranteed by my neighbor Glenn to reduce stress, anxiety, fidgeting, involuntary vocal outbursts, and general psychological malaise. Never again will the price of a pile of noodles or a weird pizza induce apoplectic fits of rage.

GAMEPLAY
Everything costs too much! Whack all that stuff and get those prices back down to a more reasonable state. Note: Glenn recommends having sound on to get the full deflation effect.

CONTROLS
tap/click: WHACK and DEFLATE

Never pay full price for chocoblop again!


Stupid eggs...

A pox and a curse on those fat cats... er... ducks?
